Articles.Content: Has anybody got a working Mk3 shuttle with a cargobay that fits at least one orange tank to survive both to orbit and back? Pictures please ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

This request for an exchange of spacecraft has been moved to the spacecraft exchange.

Cheers,

-Claw
I have one. See my sig. I will post an updated ship this weekend.

I'm working on one.

It still has a lot of problems though.

It burns up when re-entry heating is set to 100%, it has trouble pulling the nose up before touchdown, resulting in a hard landing.

At least the launch sequence works.

I'll show some pics later.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/naVJs)

[http://www./download/czqdd7hp9ago9ch/Space_Shuttle(2).craft](http://www./download/czqdd7hp9ago9ch/Space_Shuttle%282%29.craft)

Anyone who wants to modify it can, just leave me some kind of credits.
